Definition.WordDefinition: cop n : uncomplimentary terms for a policeman [syn: {bull}, {copper}, {fuzz}, {pig}] v 1: take by theft; "Someone snitched my wallet!" [syn: {hook}, {snitch}, {thieve}, {knock off}, {glom}] 2: take into custody; "the police nabbed the suspected criminals" [syn: {collar}, {nail}, {apprehend}, {arrest}, {pick up}, {nab}] [also: {copping}, {copped}]
